game_1.title: Bright
game_1.summary: Set in a world where fantasy creatures live side by side with humans. A human cop is forced to work with an Orc to find a weapon everyone is prepared to kill for. Set in a world where fantasy creatures live side by side with humans. A human cop is forced to work with an Orc to find a weapon everyone is prepared to kill for.

game_2.title: Need For Speed
game_2.summary: A mechanic who moonlights as an underground race-car driver strives to take the top prize in America's most prominent street race in order to have his revenge against the ambitious ex-NASCAR champ who had him framed and sent to prison.

game_3.title: Revolt
game_3.summary: It's a wonderfully addictive combination of a kart racing game and a simulator.
